General.Name: Lalique Group SA
General.Description: Lalique Group SA creates, develops, markets, and distributes luxury goods worldwide. It offers perfumes, cosmetics, crystal glass, jewelry, high-end furniture, home accessories, lifestyle accessories, art, and interior design products, as well as single malt whisky. The company also provides gastronomy and hospitality services, which include the operation of hotels and restaurants. It markets its products under the LaliquePerfumes, Jaguar Fragrances, Bentley Fragrances, Parfums Grès, ParfumSamouraï, Brioni, Superdry Fragrances, Ultrasun, and Glenturret brands. The company was formerly known as Art & Fragrance SA and changed its name to Lalique Group SA in June 2016. Lalique Group SA was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
